00111 class NT3D_glx_drv_o : public NT3D_drv_vp_o {
00112 public:

00120   NTreturn Close();
00122   void MakeCurrent() { /*cerr << "NT3D_glx_drv_o : "<<_uniqId() <<"MC"<<endl;*/
00123                        if (NT_FALSE == glXMakeCurrent (dpy, win, ctx )) NT_CERR(1,"NT3D_glx_drv_o::MakeCurrent - error : unable to comply. Current rendering context not changed.");
00124                        //else cerr << dpy << " "<< win <<" " << ctx << " "/*"NT3D_glx_drv_o::MakeCurrent - talk : Made windowNumber "*/<< windowNumber <<" current rendering context." << endl;
00125                        }
00127   void SwapBuffer() { /*cerr << "NT3D_glx_drv_o : "<<_uniqId() <<"SB"<<endl;*/
00128                       glXSwapBuffers (dpy, win);}
00129   NTreturn Resize(NTsize width, NTsize height);
00130   NTreturn SetWindowTitle(string newTitle);

00134   NT3D_bitmap_o   View2Bitmap();

00136
